tool_description: gives list of my friends and messages
name: Random Friend
title: Random Friend

api_list.name: Random Names
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-friend.p.rapidapi.com/getname/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-friend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-friend.p.rapidapi.com/getname/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-friend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
